title: About Me
description: I am a PhD candidate in Robotics at the Colorado School of Mines, with a mechanical engineering foundation and a research focus on human-centered robotic systems. My work explores dexterous manipulation, multi-modal sensing, and AI-driven control strategies, particularly for prosthetic and teleoperation hands. I enjoy bridging mechanical design with intelligent software, and aim to contribute to next-generation robotic systems that are intuitive, adaptive, and impactful.
